name: Nordic Council
goal:
The Nordic Council is the official inter-parliamentary body in the Nordic Region. The Nordic Council was formed in 1952. The Council has 87 elected members from Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway and Sweden as well as from the Faroe Islands, Greenland and Ã…land.
The Nordic Council's elected members can form party groups. A party group must consist of at least four members and have representatives from at least two countries.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Transport
euInitiatives:
Antibiotic resistence, for example proposal for a Regulation on veterinary medicinal products (COM (2014) 558 - 2014/0257 (COD)

REACH/Chemicals - hormone disrupting chemicals, also known as endocrine disrupting chemicals (EDCs)

Also, fishery policy, agricultural policy, energy policy,
Climate change, Consumer policy
